blocks.name: elfzm12
blocks.content: Membership in a curtailed finite sequence of integers. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfzm12(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wi(wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cfz, c0))))
} = {
  sseld(c1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(nat1, cfz, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cn), wss(co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))))
  nnz(c0)
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cle, c0))
  lem1d(c0, wcel(c0, cz))
  zre(c0)
  mpancom(wcel(c0, cz), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cle, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz))
  peano2zm(c0)
  eluz(co(c0, cmin, nat1), c0)
  fzss2(c0, co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat1)
}

blocks.name: nn0seqcvg
blocks.content: A strictly-decreasing nonnegative integer sequence with initial term ` N ` reaches zero by the ` N ` th term. Inference version. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0seqcvg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0)
  -| wf(c0, cn0, cn0)
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0, nat0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wne(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), nat0), wceq(nat1, nat1))
  eqid(nat1)
  nn0seqcvgd(s0, c0, c1, wceq(nat1, nat1))
  a1i(wceq(nat1, nat1), wf(c0, cn0, cn0))
  a1i(wceq(nat1, nat1), wceq(c1, cfv(c0, nat0)))
  adantl(wceq(nat1, nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wne(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), wbr(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, nat1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: lediv2aALT
blocks.content: Division of both sides of 'less than or equal to' by a nonnegative number. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 7-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm lediv2aALT(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))), wi(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cle, co(c2, cdiv, c0))))
} = {
  3imtr4d(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cle, co(c2, cdiv, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), cle, co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))))
  syl(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))), wi(wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), cle, co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))), w3a(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))))
  sylanbrc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))), w3a(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))), wa(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)))
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wa(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr)))
  ancoms(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr)))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr))
  syldan(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  rereccl(c1)
  syldan(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr), wne(c0, nat0))
  rereccl(c0)
  simp3(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)))
  df-3an(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)))
  ex(w3a(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), cle, co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))))
  lemul2a(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), co(nat1, cdiv, c0), c2)
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))))
  lerec(c0, c1)
  breq12d(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cle, co(c2, cdiv, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))))
  3adant1(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wceq(co(c2, cdiv, c1), co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))))
  ancoms(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wceq(co(c2, cdiv, c1), co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))), wceq(co(c2, cdiv, c1), co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))), w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  adantr(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c1)
  gt0ne0(c1)
  3anass(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  divrec(c2, c1)
  3adant2(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wceq(co(c2, cdiv, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))))
  ancoms(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wceq(co(c2, cdiv, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))), wceq(co(c2, cdiv, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))), w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wcel(c2, cc))
  recn(c2)
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  recn(c0)
  gt0ne0(c0)
  3anass(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))
  divrec(c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: abs2sqle
blocks.content: The absolute values of two numbers compare as their squares. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 7-Sep-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm abs2sqle(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2))))
} = {
  dedth2h(c0, nat0, c1, nat0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2))), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cle, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2))), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cle, cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)))), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), cexp, nat2))))
  bibi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cle, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2)))
  breq1d(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))))
  breq1d(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))))
  oveq1d(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, nat2, cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))))
  fveq2(c0, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc)), cabs)
  bibi12d(wceq(c1, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), wbr(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cle, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cle, cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)))), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), cexp, nat2)))
  breq2d(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cle, cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), wceq(c1, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))))
  syl(wceq(c1, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), wb(wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), cexp, nat2))), wceq(cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)))))
  fveq2(c1, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)), cabs)
  breq2d(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), cexp, nat2), wceq(cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)))))
  oveq1(cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), cexp, nat2)
  abs2sqlei(cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc)), cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)))
  elimel(c0, cc, nat0)
  elimel(c1, cc, nat0)
  0cn()
}

blocks.name: abs2sqlt
blocks.content: The absolute values of two numbers compare as their squares. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 7-Sep-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm abs2sqlt(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2))))
} = {
  dedth2h(c0, nat0, c1, nat0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2))), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), clt, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2))), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), clt, cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)))), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), cexp, nat2))))
  bibi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), clt, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2)))
  breq1d(cfv(cabs, c0), clt, cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))))
  breq1d(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))))
  oveq1d(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, nat2, cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))))
  fveq2(c0, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc)), cabs)
  bibi12d(wceq(c1, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), wbr(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), clt, cfv(cabs, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), clt, cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)))), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), cexp, nat2)))
  breq2d(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), clt, cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), wceq(c1, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))))
  syl(wceq(c1, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), wb(wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2)), wbr(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), cexp, nat2))), wceq(cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)))))
  fveq2(c1, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)), cabs)
  breq2d(co(cfv(cabs, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))), cexp, nat2), clt, co(cfv(cabs, c1), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), cexp, nat2), wceq(cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)))))
  oveq1(cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc))), cexp, nat2)
  abs2sqlti(cif(c0, nat0, wcel(c0, cc)), cif(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cc)))
  elimel(c0, cc, nat0)
  elimel(c1, cc, nat0)
  0cn()
}
